item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:55 Chances: Oracle Corp. has been recognized as a Leader in the cloud database management systems by Gartner, indicating strong positioning in the cloud market. The company continues to introduce new capabilities to its cloud enterprise performance management, showcasing a commitment to innovation and addressing customer needs.
